hints.content:
$\green{70}$ trees is the same as $\green{7\text{ groups of ten}}$ trees.

There are $\red6$ parks.

Total number of trees:  
$\begin{align}&\red6\times\green{7\text{ groups of ten}}\\
=&\purple{42\text{ groups of ten}}\\
=&\purple{420}\end{align}$

question.content:
A volunteer group is planting trees at $6$ different parks. They planted $70$ trees at each park.

**How many trees did the group plant in all?**

[[â˜ƒ input-number 1]] trees
